text:
The Texas Dept of Health Services has shipped an unproven treatment for the #coronavirus to at least 70 Texas hospitals. #VitalSigns' @srbkera talked with Parkland's North Texas Poison Center about their concerns about #hydroxychloroquine & #chloroquine. 
https://t.co/XhpAH99bzs https://t.co/Dv0cBjAjxt
